name: Rectform Worm
description:
A vivid platformer where you change shape in runtime.

Controls: WASD to move, A+D and W+S to transform (and backspace to respawn – shouldn't be needed)

Premade assets used:
Some sounds from freesound.org
One my old song – you can download it if you want :)
Godot Engine

Made for Trijam #122, theme: "Transformation"

A game crafted in 3h 15min by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games)
